website_summaries.verdict: With no wiring or battery power, this simple, well-built exit sign is a good option for those in well-lit locations or with dependable lighting sources in an emergency.
pros: Unit is made from metal material that is solid and durable
No wiring is required for installation
Photoluminescent sign is designed to glow in the dark
We were surprised at how visible this exit sign was in dark environments
Considering its size and brightness, visibility should not be a concern
cons: While the sign is easily visible in the dark, the lack of lighting means the area around the sign may not be as visible as with other LED-lit models

customer_reviews.title: Does the job right
customer_reviews.text: The inspector came and passed the premises with no problem. Save that kind of money on electricians and other products. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miami Beach Native

customer_reviews.title: Great glow, but arrived dinged up.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my store so we could pass safety inspection. We haven't had our inspection, but I already know we are going to be fine because these glow very bright. The glow makes up for how underwhelming they feel for the money, $50 each and they are made of very thin metal. I ordered two of these and one came in perfect condition, the other came with dings and bends in the metal. I wish they would have been sent in something more secure than a bubble mailer.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: Yes - you can see it in the dark
customer_reviews.text: Perfect....and yes you can see it in the dark. I did not want to run electrical to my front and back doors of my hall rental. This serves the purpose perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good signs!
customer_reviews.text: Great signs, but be aware: there's a purple and teal cover over the sign when it's shipped. We returned them and purchased again, and thinking they sent us the wrong colors. Once Night Bright explained, we were good to go.

product_meta.title: Photoluminescent Exit Sign Red - Aluminum Code Approved UL 924 / IBC/NFPA 101
product_meta.description: NightBright USA Photoluminescent Exit Signs retain their afterglow once charged with only 5 ft candle of ambient light without requiring any additional electrical wiring, therefore offering considerable savings on electricity and maintenance. All of NightBright USA’s High performance photoluminescent exit signs are backed with a 30 year guarantee for interior installations. Beyond the significant cost savings, our signs offer a truly safe evacuation in the event of a total loss of power or backup power. NightBright USA signs and evacuation systems are fully code compliant at a National, State and Local level. We meet code compliance of all Nationally recognized building and fire codes: IBC (International Building Code) IFC (International Fire Code) ICC (International Code Council) NFPA 101 Life safety Code (National Fire Protection Association) OSHA (Occupational Safety and Health Administration) Meets and exceeds New York City Building Code Reference Standards RE 6-1 and RS 6-1A. Night Bright signs are LEED credit eligible in 3 categories NightBright USA has also met rigorous testing standards including: ETL listed to UL924 standards ETL listed to UL746c (impact test for floor proximity signs) ASTM 2072 E (IBC version) ASTM D 4828 1994 BSS 7239 ASTM D 3648-2004 ASTM E 162-2002 ISO 17398:2004 Dimensions 14.25 inches x 7.5 inches x 0.02 inches. Very easy installation. Manufactured in the USA on 100% recyclable aluminum. Easily cleaned, washable with damp cloth. Environmentally Friendly may be safely disposed of in a sanitary landfill, or even better it can be taken to the recycling center.
